org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.impl

Class TavernaRunManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.impl.TavernaRunManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote, RunAccounting, WorkerFactory, RemoteRunFactory

    public class TavernaRunManager
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteRunFactory, RunAccounting, WorkerFactory
    The registered factory for runs, this class is responsible for constructing runs that are suitable for particular users. It is also the entry point for this whole process.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
    See Also:
    LocalWorker, Serialized Form

      • TavernaRunManager

        public TavernaRunManager(String command)
                  throws RemoteException
        An RMI-enabled factory for runs.
        Parameters:
        command - What command to call to actually run a run.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong during creation of the instance.

    • Method Detail

      • unwrapWorkflow

        protected Element unwrapWorkflow(Document containerDocument)
        How to get the actual workflow document from the XML document that it is contained in.
        Parameters:
        containerDocument - The document sent from the web interface.
        Returns:
        The element describing the workflow, as expected by the Taverna command line executor.

      • make

        public RemoteSingleRun make(byte[] workflow,
                            String creator,
                            UsageRecordReceiver urReceiver,
                            UUID id)
                     throws RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteRunFactory
        Makes a workflow run that will process a particular workflow document.
        Specified by:
        make in interface RemoteRunFactory
        Parameters:
        workflow - The (serialised) workflow to instantiate as a run.
        creator - Who is this run created for?
        urReceiver - Where to write any usage records. May be null to cause them to not be written.
        id - The UUID of the run to use, or null if the execution engine is to manufacture a new one for itself.
        Returns:
        A remote handle for the run.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: RemoteRunFactory
        Asks this factory to unregister itself from the registry and cease operation.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface RemoteRunFactory

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments from the command line invocation.
        Throws:
        Exception - If we can't connect to the RMI registry, or if we can't read the workflow, or if we can't build the worker instance, or register it. Also if the arguments are wrong.

      • setInteractionServiceDetails

        public void setInteractionServiceDetails(String host,
                                         String port,
                                         String webdavPath,
                                         String feedPath)
                                  throws RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteRunFactory
        Configures the details to use when setting up the workflow run's connnection to the interaction feed.
        Specified by:
        setInteractionServiceDetails in interface RemoteRunFactory
        Parameters:
        host - The host where the feed is located.
        port - The port where the feed is located.
        webdavPath - The path used for pushing web pages into the feed.
        feedPath - The path used for reading and writing notifications on the feed.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • countOperatingRuns

        public int countOperatingRuns()
        Description copied from interface: RemoteRunFactory
        Gets a count of the number of workflow runs that this factor knows about that are in the Operating state.
        Specified by:
        countOperatingRuns in interface RemoteRunFactory
        Returns:
        A count of "running" workflow runs.
